tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FinancialSecurityTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_script TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE security_patches (
  patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patch_description TEXT,
  patch_date TIMESTAMP,
  system_affected INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (system_affected) REFERENCES financial_systems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_patch_management (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_description TEXT,
  script_name TEXT,
  script_content TEXT,
  script_owner TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE security_tasks_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT,
  executed_at TIMESTAMP,
  executed_by TEXT,
  result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE financial_systems (
  system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name TEXT,
  current_version TEXT,
  last_patched_at TIMESTAMP,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_patches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255),
    patch_version VARCHAR(100),
    patch_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255),
    system_type VARCHAR(100),
    system_owner VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE security_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    system_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES financial_systems(system_id)
)

CREATE TABLE automation_scripts (
    script_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    script_name VARCHAR(255),
    script_content TEXT,
    script_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE security_patches (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    patch_description TEXT,
    patch_version TEXT,
    patch_release_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_type TEXT,
    task_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE financial_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    system_type TEXT,
    system_description TEXT,
    system_owner TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_type TEXT,
    action_status TEXT
);
